name: 格蕾茜·格拉姆
name_full: 格蕾茜·格拉姆 Gracie Glam
birth_place: 美国,北卡罗来纳州,罗利
introduction: Gracie Glam was born in Raleigh, North Carolina on September 30, 1990. While taking college classes in Florida and doing promotional work, she shot her first nude layout for Score Magazine. She did several solo videos before performing with another girl for Reality Kings. Glam moved to Los Angeles, California and enrolled in the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising. However, her workload increased in LA, and she put off school for the time being.
